full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN CHOS SKOR LAS, 'CHI KHA MA'I SEMS CAN PHAN THABS BYA TSUL NYAMS DBUGS 'BYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES 'CHI KA MA'I SEMS CAN PHAN THABS BYA TSUL NYAMS THAG DBUGS 'BYIN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DENG DUS SNYIGS MAR GYUR BAR DBANG GIS BAL BA RNAMS LHA CI 'GRO BA MANG PO'I THABS GZHAN MDZAD ME MKHYEN PA MANG PO MTHONG BAS RKYEN BYAS, MCHOG DMAN THAMS CAD KYIS LAG TU BLANG BDE BA 'DI 'DRA ZHIG BRIS NA 'GA' ZHAG LA PHAN PAR 'GYUR BA SRID SNYAM NAS, KU S'A LI DHARMA BADZRA GYIS ME TOG LDUM RA'I BSTI GNAS SU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BIKshA WA GINDRA SHA SA NA WA RTAS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,)
